comment: It's a fake - a cropped down picture with Obama's face photoshopped onto it. Sorry to burst your bubble....
amr:
# ::snt It's a fake - a cropped down picture with Obama's face photoshopped onto it. Sorry to burst your bubble....
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / fake-02
            :ARG1 (ii / it))
      :snt2 (p / picture-01
            :ARG1 (f2 / face
                  :part-of (p2 / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Obama")))
            :ARG1-of (c / crop-01
                  :direction (d / down))
            :ARG1-of (p3 / photoshoot-00
                  :ARG2 (o / onto
                        :op1 (ii2 / it))))
      :snt3 (s / sorry-01
            :ARG1 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG2 (b / burst-02
                  :ARG0 ii3
                  :ARG1 (b2 / bubble
                        :poss (y / you)))))
